lankawa thula pamanak lowa purama piliganimakata lakwu, shri lankawata pigan karmanthaya hadunwadun, ethek dhiwara saha sancharaka karmanthayata pamanak prasiddhawa siti migamuwa lankawe karmantha sithiyameda sthanagatha kala, pradeshaye siya gananak denata rakiya awastha salasadun migamuwa periyamulle pihiti lanka pigan sansthawa deshapalana athapewim hethuwenda, chinayen itha adumudalata pamini pigan nishpadanawalata tharagayak dimata nohakiwima nisath 1990 di wasa damana ladi.
